articles.author: The Associated Press
articles.title: Neighbors Tunisia, Algeria both announce new governments
articles.description: North African neighbors Tunisia and Algeria have both announced the make-up of new governments
articles.content:
TUNIS, Tunisia -- 
North African neighbors Tunisia and Algeria both announced the make-up Thursday of new governments, with an unprecedentedly high number of women put forward by the Tunisian prime minister in waiting. 
Habib Jemli, nominated in November to… [+957 chars]

articles.author: ASTRID GALVAN and CHRISTOPHER SHERMAN
articles.title: US starts sending asylum seekers across Arizona border
articles.description: The U.S. government says it has started sending asylum-seekers back to Nogales, Mexico, to await court hearings
articles.content:
PHOENIX -- 
The U.S. government on Thursday began sending asylum-seekers back to Nogales, Mexico, to await court hearings that will be scheduled roughly 350 miles (563 kilometers) away in Juarez, Mexico.
Authorities are expanding a program known as Remain i… [+2306 chars]

articles.author: KAREN MATTHEWS Associated Press
articles.title: Cuomo: Rebuilding of church lost in 9/11 attacks to resume
articles.description: New York Gov. Andrew Cuomo and officials with the Greek Orthodox church say they have a plan to complete construction of a church at New York's World Trade Center in time for the 20th anniversary of the 2001 terrorist attacks
articles.content:
NEW YORK --

articles.author: The Associated Press
articles.title: Hotel operator buys The Times-Dispatch building in Richmond
articles.description: A hotel operator has purchased The Times-Dispatch building in Virginia’s capital city, but the Richmond newspaper will remain in the downtown building under a long-term lease
articles.content:
RICHMOND, Va. -- 
A hotel operator has purchased The Times-Dispatch building in Virginias capital city, but the Richmond newspaper will remain in the downtown building under a long-term lease, the companies announced Thursday.

articles.title: Man missing at Grand Canyon for 11 days has been found alive
articles.description: A man who had been missing at the Grand Canyon for 11 days has been found alive
articles.content:
GRAND CANYON NATIONAL PARK, Ariz. -- 
A man who had been missing at the Grand Canyon for 11 days has been found alive.

articles.title: What to know about the deadly Australia bushfires
articles.description: Bushfires that began at the beginning of Australia's summer are continuing to wreak havoc on communities and are expected to last for several months.
articles.content:
Australia's bushfires are continuing to wreak havoc on communities all over the country.
The wildfires began in September and are expected to last for several months as the hot weather continues.

articles.author: Matt Zarrell
articles.title: 'Affluenza teen' Ethan Couch arrested for probation violation
articles.description: Ethan Couch, the Texas man known for claiming "affluenza" as part of his defense in a fatal DUI wreck, is back in jail after violating his probation, jail records show.
articles.content:
Ethan Couch, the Texas man known for claiming "affluenza" as part of his defense in a fatal DUI crash, is back in jail after violating his probation, records show.
